# imageSet

**Instance Property**

An image set displayed in the navigation alert.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var imageSet: CPImageSet? { get }
```

## Discussion

The navigation alert doesn’t support animated images. If [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPNavigationAlert/imageSet] references an animated image, the alert displays the first image in the animation sequence.

## Getting the Alert Image

- **image**: An image displayed in the navigation alert.
